description:
Substantial demolition of existing Sorting Office Building (S.O.B.).  Demolition of 102-105 Newgate Street.  Erection of headquarters office buildings with ancillary uses including leisure, retail and IT functions, with associated car parking.  vehicular and pedestrian routes for access, servicing and landscaping.  Refurbishment and re-use of existing Public Office Building (P.O.B.) for office purposes incorporating museum use in ground floor and staff restaurant in basement.  Alterations and refurbishment of numbers 114-123 Newgate Street for Class A use at basement and ground floor with offices above. OBSERVATION TO CITY OF LONDON. 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  E01, E11, P01-P37, L01-L04
decision_conditions: Recommend that the City Corporation is notified of LBI's strong objection to the proposal as the development will seriously damage both strategic and local views of St.Paul's Cathedral because of its excessive height, in particular the important local view of St.Paul's from St.John Street.
